meanings.definition: To dress up or make oneself look attractive.
meanings.sent1: She decided to gussy up for the party by wearing her favorite dress.
meanings.sent2: Every morning, she would gussy herself up before going to work.
meanings.sent3: He always gussies up for Halloween, even though it's just a small gathering.
meanings.sent4: The garden was gussied up with colorful flowers for the summer festival.
meanings.sent5: The room was gussied up with fairy lights, creating a magical atmosphere.

meanings.definition: To enhance or improve something in a showy or flashy way.
meanings.sent1: The chef decided to gussy up the dessert with edible gold flakes.
meanings.sent2: The company gussied up their product packaging to attract more customers.
meanings.sent3: She gussied up her presentation with funny memes to make it more engaging.
meanings.sent4: The old car was gussied up with a fresh coat of paint and new rims.
meanings.sent5: The plain outfit was gussied up with a statement necklace, instantly elevating the look.
